app_descript:
Stereo

Brief: Stereo is an innovative social platform that transcends traditional podcasting by allowing users to listen and engage in live conversations on a plethora of topics, ranging from news to comedy, sports, technology, and more. With capabilities to win cash prizes by gaining followers and the ease of archiving talks for later listening, Stereo offers a real-time interactive experience for both speakers and listeners.
